Articles.Content:
I noticed this morning while going to Duna that the focus in Map view shifts back to the active vessel when you switch from Map view to Vessel view and back.  This is easily reproducible by doing the following:

  1. Get a vessel - any vessel - into LKO.  Kerbolar orbit works here too.  I'm assuming you can be in space anywhere for this happen.
  2. Go into Map view and focus in on a celestial body.  I was using Duna.
  3. Switch to Flight view (or whatever it's called to look at the active flying vessel).
  4. Switch back to Map view.  You'll notice that your focus is back on the active flying vessel.

I'm not sure if this is a bug or by design, but when I give something the focus I prefer it to keep the focus until I switch it back.
